alert.note: Alert for Banks; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:08PM EDT until August 07 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Banks County in northeastern Georgia... Jackson County in northeastern Georgia... Madison County in northeastern Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 408 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pocataligo to near Commerce to Pendergrass, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Danielsville, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Pendergrass, Ila, Pocataligo, Peach State Speedway, Diamond Hill, Apple Valley, Neese, and Banks Crossing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
